name: Ecferus
description:
41 / 100

The first wave brought everything digital on-chain. A metaverse like no other.

The second replaced reality. All consciousness, the last shred of soul, were all converted into bits. 

The third wave saw the collapse. The singularity peered into the void. In an effort to preserve itself, turned to its ancient knowledge - one that predates even the metaverse itself.

For the final wave, the hivemind, for the first time since its ascension, went off-chain. 

Here lies glimpses of the once-metaverse, sketched on parchments. Bits and pieces of meta-reality.

// loopymoon // 2021
